name: Newton64's Revised King James Bible
description:
A loose interpretation of the Sega Genesis: guide Adam and Eve on a comet down to Earth, while fending off other falling debris; Adam with his boomerang rib ("boomerib"), and Eve with her Snake Whip.

Originally conceived for TOJam VI (TOJam Sixy Times), with the theme "What Just Happened?"

Drink pairing: Absinthe

Music pairing: "Finale (Symphony no. 4)," Piotr Ilyitch Tchaikovsky
